['', ' Develop analysis plans in collaboration with project leaders for tasks such as hypothesis testing, statistical inference, power calculation, multiple testing correction. Provide guidance to bioinformatics and machine learning teams on statistical matters.  As needed, develop novel methods and contribute to open-source software development. Keep up-to-date with novel developments in statistical methods.  Generate tables and figures as needed for reports, publications, and presentations. Present to and write for both technical and general audiences on analysis results, and help develop proposals for future projects. ', 'Demonstrated interest in infectious disease research.', 'Benefits', 'Headhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this Web site or directly to managers. CZ Biohub does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. CZ Biohub will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with CZ Biohub.', 'Develop analysis plans in collaboration with project leaders for tasks such as hypothesis testing, statistical inference, power calculation, multiple testing correction.', 'As needed, develop novel methods and contribute to open-source software development.', 'Present to and write for both technical and general audiences on analysis results, and help develop proposals for future projects.', 'Access to collaborators, resources and facilities at the three partner campuses (UCSF, Berkeley and Stanford) and at partner institutions in the Bay Area and beyond.', 'Existing collaborations within CZ Biohub Advanced Optical Microscopy, Cell Atlas, Bioengineering, Data Science, Genome Editing, and Infectious Diseases.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills for general and technical audiences.', 'Research in machine learning, causal inference, or Bayesian inference.', '2+ years experience working with experimental or clinical data (research experience included).', 'Opportunity', 'CZ Biohub is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity of thought, ideas and perspectives. We are committed to cultivating an inclusive organization where all Biohubbers feel inspired and know their work makes an important contribution. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law.', 'Ability to manage multiple ongoing projects.', 'Resources to disrupt and innovate at the frontiers of our knowledge of biology and disease.', ' PhD in a statistics related field (e.g. Statistics, Biostatistics, Mathematics, Machine Learning) or Masters with relevant experience. 2+ years experience working with experimental or clinical data (research experience included). Proficient at R, programmatic data visualization, Unix shell scripting, code version control systems. Ability to manage multiple ongoing projects. Demonstrated interest in infectious disease research. Strong verbal and written communication skills for general and technical audiences. ', 'Generate tables and figures as needed for reports, publications, and presentations.', 'Keep up-to-date with novel developments in statistical methods. ', 'Requirements', 'PhD in a statistics related field (e.g. Statistics, Biostatistics, Mathematics, Machine Learning) or Masters with relevant experience.', 'A collegial and collaborative environment consisting of diverse expertise.', ' Resources to disrupt and innovate at the frontiers of our knowledge of biology and disease. A collegial and collaborative environment consisting of diverse expertise. Existing collaborations within CZ Biohub Advanced Optical Microscopy, Cell Atlas, Bioengineering, Data Science, Genome Editing, and Infectious Diseases. Access to collaborators, resources and facilities at the three partner campuses (UCSF, Berkeley and Stanford) and at partner institutions in the Bay Area and beyond. Competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the experience. ', 'Experience analyzing high-dimensional, large biological datasets.', 'Competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the experience.', 'Responsibilities', ' Research in machine learning, causal inference, or Bayesian inference. Experience analyzing high-dimensional, large biological datasets. ', 'Provide guidance to bioinformatics and machine learning teams on statistical matters. ', 'What We Provide', 'Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'Proficient at R, programmatic data visualization, Unix shell scripting, code version control systems.', 'Preferred/Desired Qualifications']

['', 'You will partner with our Search Product team to achieve results-oriented goals around search relevance and experience', 'You will partner with our Search Product team to achieve results-oriented goals around search relevance and experiencePlay a meaningful role in deciding how we can best engage and grow Etsy users by determining and helping execute on opportunities for growth through analysis of behavioral and transactional dataDesign and analyze rigorous experiments, help teams set great hypotheses, and deliver robust analysis of experiment resultsTransform raw data into meaningful and impactful analysis characterized by strong data governance, technique transparency, and clear documentationRaise the skill level of the entire analytics team through the creation of outstanding work, mentorship, and the introduction of better practices, processes, and tools', 'Qualifications', 'You have 6+ years experience as a data scientist or data analyst in which you have extracted meaning from big data sets with little engineering support. Experience working with Search and Machine Learning focused product teams is a plus.You have mastery of SQL and either R or Python, and you actively try new approaches to advance your technical skills. Bonus points for experience with the Hadoop ecosystem and Looker, Tableau, or other data visualization software.You specialize in sophisticated analyses and regularly use advanced statistical methods in your work.You distill highly complex problems into narratives that are concise, actionable, and memorable, and express your recommendations with both conviction and finesse.You are passionate about reproducible work and have picked up tools to this end; you have acted as a mentor, teaching others how to make their own work better and more efficient.', 'You distill highly complex problems into narratives that are concise, actionable, and memorable, and express your recommendations with both conviction and finesse.', 'You are passionate about reproducible work and have picked up tools to this end; you have acted as a mentor, teaching others how to make their own work better and more efficient.', 'Job Description', 'Design and analyze rigorous experiments, help teams set great hypotheses, and deliver robust analysis of experiment results', 'Raise the skill level of the entire analytics team through the creation of outstanding work, mentorship, and the introduction of better practices, processes, and tools', 'About The Role']
